Review.Titre: Your website is horrible
Review.Contenu: Your website is horrible.  The search function is not used to the best of its ability.  When searching "lighting" it brings up kitchen tables.  When searching "lighting fixtures" it brings up kitchen tables and chairs with a few lighting fixtures.  There are so many more issues with the website.  It just needs to be completely revamped to be more user friendly.

Review.Titre: Discount Expired While in Cart
Review.Contenu: I had SKU#: 62185160 in my cart along with a screen protector. I went to add one more item to my cart and came back to find the discount expired at midnight despite it being in my cart. Not a great surprise. Seems like the discount should apply if you have the item ready for checkout.

Review.Titre: Checking out was a pain
Review.Contenu: Checking out was a pain.  I had to add the credit card three times because you wouldn't let me switch from my home phone to my cell phone for text messages.  You also wouldn't allow me to delete my old credit card information.  I finally gave up on switching my phone number.  That was most irritating.

Review.Titre: Checkout was terrible and confusing
Review.Contenu: Checkout was terrible and confusing. My first credit card with a zero balance and 25k limit did not work for some reason. Had to repeatedly change the address while watching my delivery date get pushed further out each time. Terrible.

Review.Titre: I ordered a fridge during Mem Day sale…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a fridge during Mem Day sale and it was delivered with multiple dents.  I was told a new one would be ordered to replace it.  It's now December and I've given up expectations of your promise.  I tried once before to get your attention only to be told I was trying to scam NFM (as my item was already discounted from the Mem Day sale).  This was not a valid reason and a lazy response.  I was told I'd be contacted when the new one came in, but again, you've seem to have forgotten your customer service promise.  NFM is getting too big for good customer service.

Review.Titre: Website is extremely SLOW
Review.Contenu: Website is extremely slow. The Wishlist and Add to Cart functions are extremely slow, and kept getting errors. Issues with shipping. Items saying In Stock and On Display, but not shipping until January or February...Why? Sales would appear on prices, and then disappear by the time they hit the cart. It took me 3 days to get this order together for various issues. At one point, my cart even disappeared and could not be accessed. Not to mention, I kept getting signed out. Being over an hour from the store, I totally would have rather come in, but it's not possible for me. So many things not in stock and not shipping for months out, especially rugs. I was going to order two and ended up not getting them because they take so long, even though they are "in stock". Very frustrating experience!

Review.Titre: Terrible experience buying a major appliance
Review.Contenu: We bought a refrigerator from NFM recently.  We live in a rural area about an hour away, so we had it delivered.  Since we had been surprised in the past with a washer and dryer that we'd purchased from NFM in that they refused to hook it up, we specifically asked the sales person if the delivery team would be hooking up the ice maker with the new refrigerator.  She confirmed that they would.  When the refrigerator was delivered, they asked me to remove the entry door to make it easier for them.  I had to unhook the old refrigerator, which we were paying them to take away.  They refused to hook up the new unit.  We spent an hour removing all the protective plastic, installing the refrigerator door handles, hooking up the ice maker, etc.  I'm surprised they just didn't slow down and roll it out of the truck for all the effort they put into delivering this unit. We are very disappointed with the lies told by the appliance salesperson as well.  We need some living room furniture, and we have now chosen to purchase that with an honest business.  Rose Blumkin, who I have personally worked with in the past, would be turning over in her grave to see how this business has degraded.

Do not let this business get away with breaking promises to its customers. This is after NFM’s bogus response. I have already dealt with a half dozen people at NFM and it was a waste of time. They had the opportunity to do the right thing and chose not too. NFM just gives you lip service, not at all good service! These companies ought to be fined like the airlines, for late arrivals and broken promises. That might get their attention that telling the truth is important.

They are liars and I would never shop with your company or recommend to anyone.

Review.Titre: Wreck your house and your Thanksgiving
Review.Contenu: My significant other and I visited NFM 2-3 times to complete our order. We quoted out laminate and carpet install. The laminate is for 800 sq ft, which is the focal point of my complaint. We had the entire job quoted and was told that we would have to lay OSB on the subfloor to bring it to the right level. My house was built in 2006 with very good materials. We spoke with the salesman that said they typically don’t have any problems with anything at install. Move forward to the day of install. They rip my carpet up and reveal one seam that has a slight change in level. Their installer immediately says we have to pay 2500$ cash to level the entire area. I find this troubling for so many reasons. First, the installer so quickly jumped to a cash only fix. This is something that randomly came out and isn’t being added to my financing? I call the store. The sales floor manager and install manager confirm that the installers can simply add anything to their quotes. I’m sorry I got all these quotes from NFM for their contractors to determine anything they wanted? Who simply has 2500 cash to hand to someone? I feel like NFM needs better control of their contractors. It felt like I got my house destroyed and was basically held hostage to 2500$ or we leave now. This is unbecoming of NFM as a company. These installers were incredibly unprofessional telling me that my floor was basically junk. I had the floor reviewed by other contractors and they said those edges were tilted. 1 hour of sanding later and the “horrible” floor is easily doable. NFM wrecked this entire experience and wrecked my Thanksgiving. I cannot have my Thanksgiving at my house now that it’s a complete disaster. Thank you for holding me hostage and destroying my house.

If I had bought the plan and kept the mattress 30 days, then I would have had to pay an addition $60 or more to return it - that's over $120 to return and the plan. One of the other returns, I think 60 days, would have been 30% of the mattress cost to restock plus the plan fee. I really regret this purchase that I just got home with, and I am stuck with it.

Review.Titre: LONG TIME CUSTOMER VERY DISSATISFIED The chair that we requested to be…
Review.Contenu: The chair that we requested to be ordered, took 5 months to come in. Then when we get it, it is the wrong chair, so we take it back and the one we looked at was not on the floor. So picked out another one and got it home and it was not the one we looked at. Looked on line and the original one we wanted was not on display but in OMAHA STORE for pickup, so we are taking the one we got yesterday back and picking up the right one. Hopefully your website is correct, the salesman we had last night should of looked up for us and told us this. VERY DISAPPOINTING, we have been long time customers of yours for a LONG TIME and made many purchases.

Review.Titre: We have a $200 rewards card
Review.Contenu: We have a $200 rewards card. The payment process is not clear and the sheet that was given to us did not clearly outline how to use the reward card. No details on "qualifying purchases" - ended up not getting to use the card

Review.Titre: Customer experience on digital platform…
Review.Contenu: Customer experience on digital platform is not so consistent.. I lost a deal  because of it.

Review.Titre: I purchased several items from NFM
Review.Contenu: I purchased several items from NFM, there was no purchase I didn’t have a problem with!  1.  The refrigerator was not delivered on the date requested!   Was told salesman did not follow up, but in addition they said it was not in stock!  I was only looking at items that were in stock!  2.  Came with a free refrigerator. That refrigerator did not get delivered for 3 months! 3.  The washer was scratched didn’t realize until my company left that was helping me move in!  4.  Spare refrigerator door has chipped molding, just noticed when cleaning the refrigerator door!  Now it’s too late to replace!  I thought it was plastic wrapping but when I tried to remove it noticed the molding!5.  Bed headboard sold to me did not fit the bed frame I purchased!  Bedframe corner was broken!!  Be careful the sales people do and say what they need to to apparently make a sale!I have two pictures washer and refrigerator.

Review.Titre: I have tried to place this order five…
Review.Contenu: I have tried to place this order five times and was unable to several time. The original order was $3k in cost!I ordered the end tables from Amazon and still have 3 more items to go.When I called the phone number given in the opo-up message, it was no help!Fix your e-commerce site!

Review.Titre: Purchased 3 bed 2 twins and one queen…
Review.Contenu: Purchased 3 bed 2 twins and one queen and also warranty. The queen bed broke 3 weeks after I purchased it. It has been 2 months and still have not received an answer to my broken bed. They told me since it back order I have to wait. Worst customer service.

Review.Titre: Horrible Customer Relations Experience
Review.Contenu: This is one of the worst customer service experiences of my life! I went to the store and purchased the furniture paid in full and it was supposed to be delivered in 2 weeks. That was nearly 3 months ago and I still haven't received my furniture yet. No one has called me unless I call them, but they say they'll call me back with an update, and never call. I just received my first email update that said my delivery has been delayed, but common sense has told me that there's been a delay by now. Please don't listen to the sales team about when your items will be delivered, if it's not in their warehouse because there will be delays, and they will lie and tell you whatever to get the sale. At this point, I know that no one will call me to reassure me that they are monitoring this closely, because no one has checked on me yet. I'm just hoping that I get my furniture items before my lease ends next year! Honestly, NFM has good quality furniture, but horrible customer service relations. BE CAREFUL OF THE SALES.!!!!!!!The response that you gave me did not address my concerns, I understand that delays will happen, but it has been the lack of communication that I was referring to, and now I'm adding a lack of comprehension skills as well.

Review.Titre: Website is clunky
Review.Contenu: Website is clunky, payment address kept reseting every time I put in my giftcard and so I had to take items out of my cart to make it below the giftcard limit since it would have charged my credit card to the wrong address. I changed it over and over and over, but every time I went to the next step and added my card, it reset the payment to "address 1" instead of the other saved one I selected.

Review.Titre: 3, make that 4 attempts to get a freezer delivered.
Review.Contenu: Tomorrow will be the 4th time a freezer will be delivered to my home. The arrangement is to switch the door from right to left opening and take the old freezer away. First delivery guys said they didn't know how to switch the door. Had no room for the old freezer. The new one also had an issue, the freezer control did not work. Second delivery did not have the door switched and gouged my wood floor removing the old freezer. Third freezer they switched the handle but not the hinges. A fourth attempt will be made Tomorrow. This is beyond ridiculous. NFM delivers hundreds of appliances every week, yet a simple thing has cost our time, their money, and much frustration. I should have gone elsewhere.  I will in the future. Fourth time. I'm done. They rook the freezer back and then delivered again today without changing a thing. My floor is ruined, yes we're filing a claim, and I still have no freezer. It's right in the manual on how to change the door. This has gone beyond ridiculous. I'm done, NFM Omaha has lost my business. I hope you remember,  a happy customer tells 100 people,  an unhappy one tells a thousand.

Review.Titre: Delivery Options
Review.Contenu: It's frustrating that I can have an order delivered Saturday 06/10 to Blue Springs but 5 miles more takes another week to 06/17 to be able to get things delivered

Review.Titre: I have a microphone that was defective…
Review.Contenu: I have a microphone that was defective that I brought back in before the 30 days. They denied it so that was one wasted trip after I had spoken to a lady on the phone telling me it was not a problem.  Then I got a hold of the manufacturer and sent them everything they need and sent me a email telling me to take it back to the store with the email and that they would exchange it. NFM denied me again after video I sent to the manufacturer saying it was defective with the email. So I am here to complain that even after the manufacturer said it wad defective with proof of a email telling me to take it back to where I purchased it (NFM) they still didn't except that. It is a 2hour round trip for all of this because I live in Topeka,Ks. Waste of gas and time I will not be doing anymore business with your company any longer and will not refer anyone.

Review.Titre: Ridiculous policy
Review.Contenu: My husband and i were in the store.  We saw the ottoman we wanted to purchase.  The pillows we wanted were right there and the salesman said we could not purchase them unless we did it online.  So, Now I have to wait until June to get pillows I held in my hands at the store today.   Ridiculous.

Review.Titre: Bad way to buy, bad pick up experience.
Review.Contenu: Bad way to buy.  Had to get my credit card where normally it autofills.  Lazy dummies that loaded the chairs almost broke out my rear window.  Loading the tall ends first would have been a no brainer.  But then again, I guessed right.

Review.Titre: the account business is nonsense
Review.Contenu: the account business is nonsense.  i order for me , parents, husband.. all have different accounts, then i try to order and it mixes up the accounts.  pain in the butt.  I signed in as a guest so none of that should have shown up on anybody's account because I was a guest

Review.Titre: Was going to order online but upon…
Review.Contenu: Was going to order online but upon finding the product my salesperson was taken away by a floor manager to answer questions for another customer.This is unacceptable and I am left feeling very frustrated with my experience at NFM over the past 2 years.

Review.Titre: BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE
Review.Contenu: I have furnished 2 homes, an office, and a company game room within the last 2 years with NFM (not even counting the 4 families I sent to NFM to decorate their homes) and the process and quality of items were great. The issue was the 1 and only time I needed customer service to assist. The customer service put the incorrect shipment of the felt (incorrect color) on a pool table all on me and was doing little to assist. How hard would it have been to send someone out to replace the felt on a pool table with the right color and also compensate me for the damage on the 3K pool table? Doping such and offering real compensation for the damage (could have been verified when they replaced the felt) would have made me very happy and kept a customer for life. Instead it was made out to be all my fault and I was offered 50 bucks. NFM customer service does not value their customers. I closed both of my accounts (not that anyone cares or will notice) and I will search for a company who actually cares about their customers (hard to find these days).

Review.Titre: We love NFM but the site is so slow…
Review.Contenu: We love NFM but the site is so slow it's practically unusable. Everytime we change an item in the cart or click to a new page, it takes 30 seconds to load!

Review.Titre: I have been a loyal customer of NFM…
Review.Contenu: I have been a loyal customer of NFM shopper for 40 years. I bought a new refrigerator in 2019 with what I thought was a policy that covered my new purchase inside and out for 5 years. It cost about 200 dollars. Boy was I wrong. Turns out the salesman wrote my sales ticket out WRONG.  How was I to know he filled it out wrong. When I tried to use this insurance I found out I was not covered for what I thought I signed up for. The kicker is they don’t care. I was supposed to get a new washer and dryer tomorrow from them. Since I found out a loyal customer means nothing. They gave a loyal customer up for about a100 dollars.

Review.Titre: Unable to talk to anyone about delivery…
Review.Contenu: Unable to talk to anyone about delivery service times and when to hold select items that will not be “ready” at same time as other items

Review.Titre: Shopping online
Review.Contenu: I don't put in reviews and surveysI'm elderly

Review.Titre: Run, don't walk to another furniture store
Review.Contenu: I have dealt with the NFM in the Colony TX since they opened. Our first purchase was a disaster to get it delivered. We ended up giving up getting everything right and we purchased a new bed at Ashley furniture for our daughter. We chalked it up to it being a new store opening going through growing pains. Fast forward a few years and we decide to give them another shot and buy an entertainment center. It too arrived with a big divot but I was actually relieved the damage  was minimal and accepted figuring it would probably be worse the second time around.So now to what will probably be our last time buying anything there. My parents are moving into senior living and I wanted to help with the transition buy buying them new bedroom furniture. We picked out a set for my dad and my mom along with a couch for their new place. Of course my mothers set is damaged and they sent a replacement. The second set arrived also completely damaged. Now here is where it gets interesting. The delivery guys are contractors. They just drop off furniture. First they tried to deliver furniture but weren't told they were supposed to pick anything up. So they were refusing to pick up the damaged furniture the previous delivery guys dropped off. Then one of the delivery guys reveals that the furniture was already refused by another customer and the warehouse asked them to deliver it anyway and see if we would accept it. I have zero idea who is running this show but when they sent people to fix the store 8 years ago from the Nebraska store, they failed to keep the same culture once they left the area. If I could give them ZERO stars, I certainly would.

Review.Titre: The website gave constant errors when…

Review.Titre: Online issues
Review.Contenu: Online issues. Couldn't remember account password. Never received email to reset account password. Set up new account. Could not connect NFM card as I didn't know the number. Had to call in. Would be nice to have a process online to identify myself and find card number versus wasting time calling in. Took 15 mins for purchase versus what could have been 5 mins.

A week this store is the size of a town and it takes a week for a mini fridge! So my wife will b without a birthday present on the 18th!! Thank NFM!!! NOT HAPPY!!

I ended up buying another set of chairs, but it was a bummer not being able to get what I wanted with the clearance clause stated at checkout.

Review.Titre: Easy order, screwed up delievery

Nice screw up NFM thanks for loosing an 800 dollar christmas gift.

Review.Titre: Started on phone message link

Ok with items being out of stock as holidays likely reason.  Ordering online was long-winded and tedious.

Review.Titre: Had to cancel order because delivery…

What is the deal? I want to stay with you but this makes no sense- Please advise or I may need to go to your competitor. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Beware of Price Match Guarantee
Review.Contenu: Had an absolutely perfect experience until I tried to get credit for a price match. Instead they credited me only $10 because I used the $10 coupon. So basically my coupon was worthless; they kept that money for themselves. I could walk in today and buy it cheaper with this coupon.This is the second microwave I’ve had to buy from them in the last 2 years. If they want to anger a customer over $10 that’s their business. This isn’t right.They acted like they did me a favor by giving me a $10 store credit but I don’t really want it now. Shame on them.UPDATE: After contacting customer service they agreed to refund the extra $10. It’s not their policy to do this which I can’t understand, but they made an exception in my case. I’m happy they did.

Review.Titre: Shipping and Quality
Review.Contenu: The last few times I've ordered I have been shocked at the amount of time it takes to receive an order, especially when I live IN NEBRASKA.  I understand some things have to be ordered but is there not a more efficient and effective way to handle this? I think the biggest thing is....it was very hard to make a purchase decision based on SO MANY crappy reviews. I didn't really want to go to the trouble of opening another account with a different company and end up with two open furniture credit accounts. All the negative reviews seem to be similar and reference shoddy craftsmanship. You have to see this. You have to be seeing the number of reviews that come through that are all similar and are all complaining about the same thing.....crappy furniture. I purchased some furniture from NFM back in the 1990's and I was very pleased. We received the order quickly - which was shipped to Kansas City before there was a store there. Now, I can't tell you the number of people of whom I've heard say that they simply just stopped shopping at NFM because the quality of furniture has steadily gone down hill. So why are you continuing to purchase from the same companies? Why are you not demanding that their standards be a higher quality? NFM is huge. It seems like you would be in a position to make demands or threaten using other venders. I urge you to truly sit down and take the time to read MANY reviews. If there is an item that has (for example) 23 reviews with an average of 4.5 stars, one would think that has to be pretty good. Don't look at that stat and nothing else. Go in and read the reviews. You'll see that there are many reviews for that one specific piece of furniture that all reference crappy, cheap furniture. That isn't what NFM USED to stand for. Step up. Rebrand! Make this a better shopping experience, especially for mid to lower earners who really look for deals and affordable pricing. It has turned into "affordable=cheap furniture" at NFM.  Y'all should fix that.

Review.Titre: Environmental Haul option confusing
Review.Contenu: The environmental haul away option was very frustrating because there were two options for in-home delivery. Originally I selected the 2-day in home delivery which prompted the environmental haul options to select, but I inadvertently cleared out my cart and had to reselect everything. when I got to the shipping, there was another in-home delivery option for $10 cheaper which would delivery tomorrow so I selected that, however, I couldn't get the environmental haul options to populate again and couldn't figure out why so I cleared out again and tried a few more times only to realize that those options won't populate on the $109 in home delivery option. it only populates on the 119 in home delivery option. if the options include something different, then put that in the description of the item so we can tell which one has a haul option and which one doesn't so we don't waste our time fumbling around looking for that option. The only description difference was that one would deliver tomorrow, and one would deliver in two days.

Review.Titre: The sales lady was loud and rude to me
Review.Contenu: The sales lady was loud and rude to me. I was looking for a phone that I saw online that I could send to South Africa; this phone is for my nephew, and I have bought several phones/unlocked at NFM over the years and sent to South Africa and they work fine. She yelled at me saying " 1st of all there's no garuntuee that these will work in South Africa," and I said to ger, we;ve bought these before and they work fine. She continue to argue that they may not work and was annoyed- I'm not sure to take this as Xenophobic or just a bad customer service on her side. I told her, we'll use the phone either way. The entire time we were there she was just awful. She told if she order the phone it will be available 1st week of August and the other phone that was comparable to that phone was not available at all, my surprise when I check your website this morning the phone is available in 2 weeks from today. I've been a loyal customer of Nebraska for over 15 years and never experienced this.  I just ordered the phone and it will be available in 2 weeks. When I went to pay for my items that  bought, the teller asked for my ID, he was polite, but I was surprised, I've never been asked for ID before and everybody around me were paying using their NFM credit cards without ID. These 2 incidents spoiled my entire day, we drive  to NFM for 2 hrs, it is always fun and a great experience- we get coffees and eat lunch and always treated fairly and great. I can't get over this, but I love NFM.

When you add an item to cart, if there are accessories that match that exact item you should be given the opportunity to do this on the spot.  Heck, Amazon even pre-bundles items FOR YOU and gives you the option to click to add all three - say, a laptop, a bag, and a spare charger - NFM should do this too.  It's basic UX design.  Love the company, longtime customer here, not going anywhere.  Just do better on your ecommerce site.
